para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Arial; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: 请在熟读并了解本手册的内容后再操作此仪器！！！

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-28px; margin-left:28px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

text.style: font-family:??ì?; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: 禁止将仪器主机电源接入非标称电源或者直流电源。

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-28px; margin-left:28px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

text.style: font-family:??ì?; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: 仪器在试验状态时,不要进行接线和换线工作,避免将外部源引入到仪器输出端子,使仪器损坏.

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-28px; margin-left:28px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

text.style: font-family:??ì?; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: 试验之前，接地线插孔必须可靠接地，以防止测试仪运行中机身感应静电。

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-28px; margin-left:28px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

text.style: font-family:??ì?; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: 禁止将外部电压源或电流源引入测试仪电压、电流输出端口，以防损坏测试仪。

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-28px; margin-left:28px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

text.style: font-family:??ì?; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: 电压回路不能短路或过载，电流回路的负载应根据技术参数中所给定的阻抗值，以免过载影响试验结果。

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-28px; margin-left:28px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

text.style: font-family:??ì?; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: 当电压源出现过载或短路时，测试仪自动切断功放电源并中断试验，同时发出告警信号。

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-28px; margin-left:28px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

text.style: font-family:??ì?; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: 如果大电流输出时间过长，功放温升过高时，测试仪将自动关闭功放电源，并给出告警音，此时应停止试验，直至功放冷却后方可继续试验。

text.style: font-family:??ì?; font-size:12pt; font-weight:bold; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: 建议将仪器平放使用，并保证在仪器工作时出风口通畅。

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-28px; margin-left:28px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

text.style: font-family:??ì?; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: 仪器出现异常状况时，请联系厂家，切勿自行拆机维修。

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-28px; margin-left:28px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

text.style: font-family:??ì?; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: 如果试验过程中出现紧急问题，迅速关闭主机电源。

list.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:-28px; margin-left:28px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:12pt; color:#000000;

text.style: font-family:??ì?; font-size:12pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

li.text: 仪器长时间不用应放回包装箱内。

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.0; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
